content:
# The error indicates that we do not have any copper plates available in our inventory to insert into the furnace for crafting purposes. 
# This suggests that the previous operations did not yield any copper plates as expected, or they were not properly accounted for.

# Given that we have 5 iron ore and 10 coal, we can focus on gathering more copper ore to produce additional copper plates.
# Since the copper furnace is still operational and has copper ore available, we should ensure it is working effectively.

# Let's gather more copper ore to ensure we can produce enough copper plates for our crafting needs.
copper_position = nearest(Resource.CopperOre)
if copper_position:
    move_to(copper_position)  # Move to the nearest copper ore position
    harvest_resource(copper_position, quantity=10)  # Gather more copper ore
else:
    print("No nearby copper ore patches available!")  # Nothing to gather

# After gathering more copper ore, we will check the inventory.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()} after gathering more copper.")  # Check inventory after gathering
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()} after gathering resources.")  # Check entities status again.
